abstract: Writer Stephen Karam will see two of his works that focus on the subject matter of families produced in Fall 2011; play Sons of the Prophet will open at the Roundabout Theater Company, and chamber opera Dark Sisters will open at the Gerald W Lynch Theater; both deal with subject matter of families.
snippet: The writer Stephen Karam has two productions this fall: the play “Sons of the Prophet” and the chamber opera “Dark Sisters.”
lead_paragraph: The writer Stephen Karam has two productions this fall: the play “Sons of the Prophet” and the chamber opera “Dark Sisters.”

headline.main: Darkly Comic Voice Adds a Libretto to His Résumé
headline.print_headline: Darkly Comic Voice Adds a Libretto To His Résumé
headline.seo: Stephen Karam’s ‘Sons of the Prophet’ and ‘Dark Sisters’
